text: The guzheng, also spelled gu zheng or gu-zheng (, with gu 古 meaning "ancient"; and also called zheng 箏) is a Chinese plucked zither. ==Books== *Han Mei. "Guzheng." In The New Grove Dictionary of Music and Musicians, second edition, edited by Stanley Sadie and John Tyrrell (London, 2001). Category:Chinese music Category:Chinese musical instruments
title: Guzheng
